system.description:
Raises corpses or piles of bones as undead servants (skeletons or zombies) that obey your commands. You can control up to 4 undead at once.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can control more undead. At dice count 6, creates more powerful undead. At dice count 9, undead are intelligent and skilled. At dice count 12, creates specialized undead. At dice count 15, raises armies of undead.
